name: You're Not Going to Escape
description:
You are in a facility and a giant robot is trying to kill you. Your objective is to survive for as long as possible.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Movement:

Running and Jumping ; WASD or Arrow Keys

Wall Climbing ; upon latching onto a surface, up arrow or W to go up | down arrow or S to go down.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Good luck, have fun, and enjoy.
